Detailed Description

Class Attributes is a container to convey the attributes of a file. Files of different storage devices support different attributes. Hence, this class provides method IsDefined() to check whether a distinct attribute is defined. If so, the attribute can be retrieved using the respective getter or interrogation method.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum File::Attributes::Type
 

This enumeration defines the attributes that a file might support.

Date File::Attributes::GetAccessDate (   )  const [inline]

BOOLEAN File::Attributes::IsDefined (  Type  attribute  )  const [inline]
 

Tells whether attribute is defined. The attribute is defined when its value has been set using the respective setter method. If the attribute is defined, its value can be retrieved using the respective getter or interrogation method.

BOOLEAN File::Attributes::IsDirectory (   )  const [inline]
